code_snippet:
import pathlib

import setuptools
from setuptools.command.install import install


class InstallCommand(install):
    def run(self):
        super().run()

        from AutoROM import main

        download_dir = pathlib.Path(self.install_lib) / "AutoROM" / "roms"
        download_dir.mkdir(exist_ok=True, parents=True)
        main(True, None, download_dir, False)


setuptools.setup(
    name="AutoROM.accept-rom-license",
    cmdclass={"install": InstallCommand},
)

mapped_sequence.description: Path object and status operations (creating Path objects, retrieving file status)
Creates directory, ignoring if it already exists

pattern_analysis.contextual_code:
import pathlib
from setuptools.command.install import install

class InstallCommand(install):
    def run(self):
        super().run()
        from AutoROM import main
        download_dir = pathlib.Path(self.install_lib) / "AutoROM" / "roms"
        download_dir.mkdir(exist_ok=True, parents=True)
        main(True, None, download_dir, False)
